revised_title: The Physical Properties of Homologues and Isomers: Density, Expansion, and Vapour-Tension of Propyl and Isopropyl Iodides
tldr: The author investigates the physical properties of homologues and isomers, focusing on density, expansion, and vapour-tension of propyl and isopropyl iodides. The study aims to compare the molecular volumes of these isomers at their boiling points and establish a connection between vapour-tension and rate of expansion.
